reviewText: Tristan gives step by step instruction, simple, effective, energizing, and life changing DVD.  I practice mediation daily.

This DVD and audio CD set was my first introduction to Zen meditation. I find myself continually returning to it as I discover new aspects of meditation through my practice.  Sensei Tristan's explanations are crystal clear and the five step method a great way to begin to grasp the vastness of meditation.

The Art of Mushin Meditation This the most beautiful Meditation DVD/CD collection I have ever watched and listened to over the last couple of years. Whether you are just beginning a meditation practice or a seasoned meditator, I highly recommend this collection to everyone who would like to enhance their lives and their meditation practice. Dana Gribi
